alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Hudspeth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued March 25 at 1:31AM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THE EVERMAN POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR NOEL RODRIGUEZ-ALVEREZ, A HISPANIC MALE WHO IS 6 YEARS OLD OF UNKNOWN HEIGHT AND WEIGHT. HE HAS BLACK HAIR AND BROWN EYES. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR CINDY CECILIA RODRIGUEZ-SINGH, WHO IS 37 YEARS OLD. SHE IS A HISPANIC FEMALE WHO IS 5 FEET TALL AND WEIGHS 140 POUNDS. SHE HAS BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES AND HAS TATTOOS ACROSS HER CHEST, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A GRAY, 2012, CHEVROLET, SILVERADO BEARING TEXAS LICENSE PLATE NUMBER P L S 7 0 9 1. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN IN EVERMAN, TEXAS. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE EVERMAN POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 8 1 7 2 9 3 2 9 2 3.
